alert.note: Alert for Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 4:55AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley zone. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur this afternoon. Expect heavy snow showers today before briefly decreasing tonight. Snow will increase once again on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
